verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a Monday afternoon tweet] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: the “ leaks coming out of the White House are a massive over exaggeration put out by the Fake News Media in order to make us look as bad as possible] . ”
